name: KesleyDeathTurn
_source: speak;Hakeem;Your tribe. You prosper, yet you do not share!|You have these structures, yet we are stuck with tents!|I am tired of this disparity!
speak;Ahmari;You could'a asked instead of this madness!
speak;Hakeem;Hmph, I only know the way of the figher.|The only words I seek, are your last!
speak;Ahmari;If that's what you want, you'll be waiting an eternity, hah!
